title: Persons affected with Hansen's disease represented by attorney general
context: §580-44 Persons affected with Hansen&rsquo;s disease represented by attorney general. Upon application of the director of health, the attorney general or the attorney general&rsquo;s deputies shall represent any person affected with Hansen&rsquo;s disease detained at any hospital, settlement, or place for the care and treatment of persons affected with Hansen&rsquo;s disease in proceedings for divorce. [L 1943, c 39, §1; RL 1945, §12220; am L 1949, c 53, §29; RL 1955, §324-30; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §19; HRS §580-44; am L 1969, c 152, §1; am L 1983, c 124, §16; gen ch 1985]
